question.title: Epson SDK Issue (Android)
question.body:
I am trying to print to one epson printer from multiple devices. It prints for the first device, but then crashes the application on the other device(s). Below is my code. The toast returns the number 3, but i cannot figure out what error that represents. Any help would be much appreciated.

private void printToKitchen() throws Epos2Exception {

        SharedPreferences mPrefs = getSharedPreferences("printers", 0);
        String kitchenPrinterIP = mPrefs.getString("kitchenPrinterIP", "default_value_if_variable_not_found");
        if (!kitchenPrinterIP.equals("default_value_if_variable_not_found")) {
            kitchenPrinter.connect("TCP:" + kitchenPrinterIP, Printer.PARAM_DEFAULT);
            kitchenPrinter.beginTransaction();
            kitchenPrinter.sendData(Printer.PARAM_DEFAULT);
            kitchenPrinter.endTransaction();
            kitchenPrinter.clearCommandBuffer();
        } else {
            Toast.makeText(getApplicationContext(), "Bar Printer not connected", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
        }
    }


try {
            printToKitchen();
        } catch (Epos2Exception e) {
            Toast.makeText(getApplicationContext(), " " + e.getErrorStatus() , Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
            throw new RuntimeException(e);
        }
